DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe and Asia. The aim of this observational study is to monitor antibody formation towards the room temperature stable formulation of NovoSeven® (activated recombinant human factor VII).
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study on Safety of Room Temperature Stable NovoSeven® in Patients With Haemophilia A or B
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with congenital haemophilia A or B with inhibitors to factor VIII or factor IX Treated with room temperature stable NovoSeven®
